name: Cursed Seas
description:
Ride the Cursed Seas Run and sail.

Controls:
WASD - controls
SPACE - shoot

Goal:
Shoot the ships, loot the cursed treasure.

Cursed treasure may include: pieces of eight, doubloons, movement de-buffs.

Created very quickly for KenneyJam2020 - https://itch.io/jam/kenney-jam-2020

Assets: Kenney - https://kenney.nl/assets

Music: The Buccaneer's Haul by Shane Ivers - https://www.silvermansound.com
